description: Stops an app block builder. Stopping an app block builder terminates the instance, and the instance state is not persisted.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: AppBlockBuilder
nested_items.description: Describes an app block builder.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The platform of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: EnableDefaultInternetAccess
nested_items.description: Indicates whether default internet access is enabled for the app block builder.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that is applied to the app block builder.

nested_items.name: VpcConfig
nested_items.description: The VPC configuration for the app block builder.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the subnets to which a network interface is attached from the fleet instance or image builder instance. Fleet instances use one or more subnets. Image builder instances use one subnet.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the security groups for the fleet or image builder.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the app block builder.

nested_items.name: AppBlockBuilderErrors
nested_items.description: The app block builder errors.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: ErrorTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time the error occurred.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The state change reason.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state change reason code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The state change reason message.

nested_items.name: AccessEndpoints
nested_items.description: The list of interface VPC endpoint (interface endpoint) objects. Administrators can connect to the app block builder only through the specified endpoints.

nested_items.name: EndpointType
nested_items.description: The type of interface endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpceId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the VPC in which the interface endpoint is used.
